traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You discern colors in that darkness only as shades of gray.

traits.name: Celestial Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to necrotic damage and radiant damage.

traits.name: Healing Hands
traits.description: As a Magic action, you touch a creature and roll a number of d4s equal to your proficiency bonus. The creature regains a number of hit points equal to the total rolled. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a Long Rest.

traits.name: Light Bearer
traits.description: You know the Light cantrip. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for it.

traits.name: Celestial Revelation
traits.description: When you reach 3rd level, choose one of the revelation forms—Necrotic Shroud, Radiant Consumption, or Radiant Soul—each of which is detailed below. You can use the chosen form once, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a Long Rest.

traits.name: Draconic Ancestry
traits.description: You are descended from a dragon. Choose the type of dragon from the Draconic Ancestors table. Your choice affects your Breath Weapon and Damage Resistance traits.

traits.name: Breath Weapon
traits.description: When you take the Attack action on your turn, you can replace one of your attacks with an exhalation of magical energy in either a 15-foot Cone or a 30-foot Line that is 5 feet wide (your choice). Each creature in that area must make a Dexterity saving throw (DC = 8 + Constitution modifier + proficiency bonus). On a failed save, a creature takes 1d10 damage of the type determined by your Draconic Ancestry. On a successful save, a creature takes half damage. The damage increases to 2d10 at 5th level, 3d10 at 11th level, and 4d10 at 17th level. You can use this trait a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, regaining all uses on a Long Rest.

traits.name: Damage Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to the damage type determined by your Draconic Ancestry.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You discern colors in that darkness only as shades of gray.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 120 feet as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You discern colors in that darkness only as shades of gray.

traits.name: Dwarven Resilience
traits.description: You have resistance to poison damage. You also have Advantage on saving throws you make to avoid or end the Poisoned condition.

traits.name: Dwarven Toughness
traits.description: Your Hit Point maximum increases by 1, and it increases by 1 again whenever you gain a level.

traits.name: Stonecunning
traits.description: As a Bonus Action, you gain Tremorsense with a range of 60 feet for 10 minutes. You must be on a stone surface or touching a stone surface to use this Tremorsense. You can use this trait a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, regaining all uses on a Long Rest.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You discern colors in that darkness only as shades of gray.

traits.name: Elven Lineage
traits.description: You are part of a lineage that grants you supernatural abilities. Choose one of the following options: Drow (Dancing Lights cantrip, then Faerie Fire at 3rd and Darkness at 5th), High Elf (a Wizard cantrip using Intelligence), or Wood Elf (speed becomes 35 ft, and you can Hide as a Bonus Action in natural phenomena).

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.description: You have Advantage on saving throws you make to avoid or end the Charmed condition.

traits.name: Keen Senses
traits.description: You have proficiency in the Perception skill.

traits.name: Trance
traits.description: You don't need to sleep, and magic can't put you to sleep. You can finish a Long Rest in 4 hours if you spend those hours in a trancelike meditation, during which you retain consciousness.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You discern colors in that darkness only as shades of gray.

traits.name: Gnomish Cunning
traits.description: You have Advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws.

traits.name: Gnomish Lineage
traits.description: You are part of a gnomish lineage that grants you supernatural abilities. Choose one: Forest Gnome (Minor Illusion cantrip and Speak with Small Beasts), or Rock Gnome (Mending cantrip and Tinker ability to create Tiny clockwork devices).

traits.name: Giant Ancestry
traits.description: You are descended from Giants. Choose one of the following benefits—a supernatural boon from your ancestry: Cloud's Jaunt (teleport as Bonus Action), Fire's Burn (extra fire damage on hit), Frost's Chill (extra cold damage and speed reduction on hit), Hill's Tumble (knock prone on hit), Stone's Endurance (reduce damage as Reaction), or Storm's Thunder (extra thunder damage in area on hit). You can use this once per Long Rest.

traits.name: Large Form
traits.description: Starting at 5th level, you can change your size to Large as a Bonus Action (no more than once per Long Rest). This lasts for 10 minutes or until you end it (no action required). While Large, you have Advantage on Strength checks and your speed increases by 10 feet.

traits.name: Powerful Build
traits.description: You have Advantage on any saving throw you make to end the Grappled condition. You also count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity.

traits.name: Brave
traits.description: You have Advantage on saving throws you make to avoid or end the Frightened condition.

traits.name: Halfling Nimbleness
traits.description: You can move through the space of any creature that is a size larger than you, but you can't stop in the same space.

traits.name: Lucky
traits.description: When you roll a 1 on the d20 for a D20 Test, you can reroll the die, and you must use the new roll.

traits.name: Naturally Stealthy
traits.description: You can take the Hide action even when you are obscured only by a creature that is at least one size larger than you.

traits.name: Resourceful
traits.description: You gain Heroic Inspiration whenever you finish a Long Rest.

traits.name: Skillful
traits.description: You gain proficiency in one skill of your choice.

traits.name: Versatile
traits.description: You gain an Origin feat of your choice.

traits.name: Adrenaline Rush
traits.description: You can take the Dash action as a Bonus Action. When you do, you gain a number of Temporary Hit Points equal to your proficiency bonus. You can use this a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, regaining all uses on a Short or Long Rest.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 120 feet as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You discern colors in that darkness only as shades of gray.

traits.name: Relentless Endurance
traits.description: When you are reduced to 0 Hit Points but not killed outright, you can drop to 1 Hit Point instead. Once you use this trait, you can't do so again until you finish a Long Rest.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You discern colors in that darkness only as shades of gray.

traits.name: Fiendish Legacy
traits.description: You are the recipient of a fiendish legacy that grants you supernatural abilities. Choose a legacy from the Fiendish Legacies table: Abyssal (Poison Spray cantrip), Chthonic (Chill Touch cantrip), or Infernal (Thaumaturgy cantrip). Starting at 3rd and 5th level, you gain additional spells based on your chosen legacy.

traits.name: Otherworldly Presence
traits.description: You know the Thaumaturgy cantrip. When you cast it with this trait, the spell uses the same spellcasting ability you use for your Fiendish Legacy trait.
